page.title: 05Elastics' games, Ipplepen.
page.content: There are{several variations}of this game which{came to Devon}schools 20 years ago. The equipment needed is a loop of elastic about 5 metres long. { One version}of the game is {Cartwheeling over the Elastic.}Three people are needed, two people stand inside the loop, the third person then cartwheels over. Their hands must go down inside the elastic loop and their feet go over both lengths of elastic. After you go over the elastic, it gets higher and higher, like hurdles. The game begins with the loop at ankle level, after each round it is moved up the body. If some-one is out she swops places with a person inside the elastic loop. The game doesn't really end because when the loop is too high to get over the game begins again. { Another version}is jumping over the elastic using twists and turns.
